mapper.select: SELECT C.*, U.id "user.id", U.nickname "user.nickname", U.avatar "user.avatar", U.sex "user.sex", U.birthday "user.birthday", U.email "user.email", U.phone "user.phone" FROM shop_commodity C INNER JOIN shop_user U ON C.uid = U.id WHERE C.uid = #{userId} ORDER BY C.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_commodity (name, price, picture, shipping_cost, create_time, size_width, size_height, uid) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{picture}, #{shippingCost}, #{createTime}, #{sizeWidth}, #{sizeHeight}, #{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop_commodity ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT C.*, U.id "user.id", U.nickname "user.nickname", U.sex "user.sex", U.birthday "user.birthday", U.email "user.email" FROM shop_commodity C INNER JOIN shop_user U ON C.uid = U.id WHERE C.id = #{id}
SELECT id, picture FROM shop_commodity WHERE level = #{level}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_commodity SET name = #{name}, size_width = #{sizeWidth}, size_height = #{sizeHeight}, price = #{price} WHERE id = #{id}
